title: Mobile App Crashing on Startup
description: A user reports the product's mobile app crashes immediately upon opening.

tasks.description: Ask the user for their device model, OS version, and app version.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers the necessary device information.

tasks.description: Check for known issues with that specific app version or OS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a known crash issue with the latest OS update.

tasks.description: Inform the user that this is a known issue the engineering team is working on and advise them to use the web application in the meantime.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sets the correct expectation and provides a workaround.
